channel.title: Reviews on Shinichi Urano's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Reviews on Shinichi Urano's personal blog

item.title: Review of Shinichi as an AWS IQ Expert
item.description: By Mordecai Machazire Worked with Shinichi in March, 2020 Rating: * * * * * Shinichi is indeed a technology expert with a great deal of experience, going well beyond just AWS. He immediately came up with several options for solving my problem. We actually ended up working together to create the most efficient solution and we’re going to be sharing it in a blog article. He is responsive, professional, and thoughtful.
